project.name: AN4 Tests
project.description:
This file is used to run the AN4 performance tests.
NOTE: Before running the tests, you must have already built the sphinx-4 sources by typing "ant" in the top level sphinx4 directory.
Run ant with -Dskip=5 to do the standard 'quick' version of a test. Run ant with -Dlogger_props=an4.props to turn on the logging.
